alert.note: Alert for Suwannee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 09 at 4:49PM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Suwannee County through 515 PM EST... At 448 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles southwest of Obrien, or 11 miles southeast of Mayo, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ichetucknee Spring, Obrien, Mcalpin, Branford and Hildreth. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
